original_text: For he built up again the high places which Hezekiah his father had destroyed; and he reared up altars for Baal, and made a grove, as did Ahab king of Israel; and worshipped all the host of heaven, and served them.
korean_text: 그의 아버지 히스기야가 헐어 버린 산당들을 다시 세우며 이스라엘의 왕 아합의 행위를 따라 바알을 위하여 제단을 쌓으며 아세라 목상을 만들며 하늘의 일월 성신을 경배하여 섬기며

sentences.original_text: For he built up again the high places
which Hezekiah his father had destroyed
and he reared up altars for Baal
as did Ahab king of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 왕 아합이 행한 것 같이 하였으며

sentences.original_text: and worshipped all the host of heaven
